root_causes: DO REPEAT block is not terminated with END REPEAT, causing subsequent logic (sum check and QA listings) to be inside the repeat or to produce a syntax error.
QA listings use SELECT IF without TEMPORARY, which will permanently filter the dataset instead of producing temporary QA outputs.
Sum-consistency check and other non-cell-level logic appear to be placed inside the DO REPEAT due to the missing END REPEAT (so the sum check may execute per cell or incorrectly).
instructions: Terminate the DO REPEAT block: add END REPEAT. immediately after the per-cell IF statements so only the cell-level checks are repeated.
Move the sum-consistency IF (the IF that sets B3cx5_flag_sum when B3cx5_sum <> S7_5) and any other non-cell-level checks so they appear after END REPEAT (i.e., outside the DO REPEAT block).
Use TEMPORARY before each SELECT IF used for QA listings to avoid permanently filtering the dataset. Example pattern: TEMPORARY. SELECT IF (B3cx5_flag_cell = 1). LIST ... .
Ensure the DK validity check remains unconditional (not gated on S7_5) and that the numeric-range check enforces 0..999 as implemented; no change needed if those are already present.
